key3.name: White Horseman
key3.description: When White horseman rides on his white horse, then the day arrives. And wherever evil spirits hides, the day light catchs them up.

key5.name: Black Horseman
key5.description: Black horseman on black horse enters to house and brings the night. He helps sorcerers and covers up traces.

key11.description: When Red horseman rides on his red horse, then sun uprises. It gives power to the Allies and weaken the enemies.

key15.name: Bogatyr
key15.description: Hero-warrior possessing great power, protector, distinguishes not only by courage, but also by diplomatic abilities.

key16.description: Hero-warrior possessing great power, protector, distinguishes not only by courage, but also by diplomatic abilities.

key17.name: Magic Dolly
key17.description: The mother's gift given before her death with blessing. This is not just a dolly - if to feed her, she always helps in troubles.

key18.name: Magic Dolly
key18.description: The mother's gift given before her death with blessing. This is not just a dolly - if to feed her, she always helps in troubles.

key19.name: Сhemise
key19.description: The chemise sewed from the magic sindon, spun and woven by Vasilisa the Wise.

key21.name: Large Shield
key21.description: The shield, forged by Svarog — divinity-blacksmith. After recognition of his owner, it can reflect the damage and ensure protection from witchcraft.

key22.description: The shield, forged by Svarog — divinity-blacksmith. After recognition of his owner, it can reflect the damage and ensure protection from witchcraft.

key23.name: Small Shield
key23.description: The shield, begot by the tree nymph. The bark of a magic oak from curved sea-shore Lukomore helps in battle dealing with the damage and also can ward off an attacks.

key26.name: Skull Lantern
key26.description: Spellfull illuminant, capable to enlight the invisible and to burn to ashes the enchanted characterstics of magic items.

key27.name: Magiс Mirror
key27.description: Magiс Mirror — item that can "duplicate the reality". The boundary between the earth and the other Subtle World.

key28.name: Clairvoyance
key28.description: «Second vision». This gift offers great possibilities. It helps to see the lie, to see damage ahead and to avoid it.

key3.name: Cave Bat
key3.description: Maid's flying warrior, can be met deep underground, attacks from air, raven on living being's blood.

key25.name: The Malachite Box
key25.description: Maid's gift. But it has a hidden agenda and brings miseries to the person who opens box without permission.

key4.name: Lizard
key4.description: Maid's irreplaceable warrior. Can appear from the stone and melt into it. Maneuvers both under and above ground.

key11.name: Earthquake
key11.description: The Malachite Maid is fearful in anger. The stone in her control and quakes according to her will, and earth layers come apart...

key26.name: The Turning Potion
key26.description: Deep underground the luminous moss grows. The Potion made of it allows to intoxicate the enemy's consciousness and to enjoy an advantage

key15.name: Apple
key15.description: In far off lands there is a garden with magic youth-giving apples. If an elder eats such apple — gets younger, and an ill — gets his health back.
